name: Project: Resonance
description:
Find filament. Shoot DAVE. 

Invade the multi-trillionaire defense contractor AUDION in this rethink of VR stealth. You're player's body is nice and safe, connected via a Brain-Computer Interface to hacked robots in facilities across the world. Thing is, AUDION isn't going to invest in cameras (disgusting) for their robots, they only have microphones. 

How's a human to pilot these drones then? Cause a ruckus, and you'll find out. Audio reprocessors synthesize a visual representation of the world for you're humans eyes to understand and navigate around. Be careful though, the algorithms aren't perfect.
